personalInfo.name: Roy M. Lucier
personalInfo.title: Executive Ministry Leader | Lead Pastor | Coach
personalInfo.tagline: Executive-level ministry leader with 20+ years building generationally diverse churches and leading multi-million dollar operations
personalInfo.summary: Executive-level ministry leader with a proven track record of leading large ministry operations, revitalizing congregations, and providing strategic oversight for multi-million dollar budgets. My experience in an 800-member church has prepared me to provide the robust, vision-driven leadership required for a congregation of 800-1200. I am seeking a long-term Lead Pastor position in Michigan or Northern Ohio where I can invest the next 20 years of my ministry, building a generationally diverse church and leading it to make a lasting impact on its community.

experience.description: Provided turnaround leadership to revitalize a congregation in a rural community of 6,000, establishing a foundation for scalable, long-term health.
achievements: Skillfully managed the transition from a 22-year long-tenured pastor, honoring the church's legacy while successfully casting vision for a new chapter of growth and outreach
More than doubled weekly attendance from 30 to 75 by implementing a clear discipleship pathway and delivering compelling, biblically-grounded preaching
Intentionally cultivated a diverse congregation, successfully growing minority representation to over 20% of the church body

experience.description: Functioned as the chief operational leader, providing executive oversight for all ministries, staff, and finances for a congregation of 800 with an annual budget of ~$2 million.
achievements: Provided executive oversight for a 15-person staff, utilizing a coaching model to foster individual growth and team alignment
Implemented strategic frameworks (4DX, 1:1s) that increased ministry effectiveness
Optimized a ~$2 million budget through strategic cost controls and resource allocation, ensuring maximum ministry impact and long-term financial stability
Ensured ministry continuity and organizational health by skillfully managing complex staff transitions and dismissals with wisdom and integrity
Championed the church-wide implementation of Planning Center Online (PCO) to scale ministry operations, streamline processes, and improve data-driven decision-making

experience.description: Directed key ministry areas in a diverse, urban setting, focusing on leadership development and strategic expansion.
achievements: Launched the 'Academy of Urban Ministry,' a strategic discipleship program designed to equip emerging leaders for high-impact ministry
Played a key role in launching a new campus and additional services to accommodate congregational growth and expand the church's regional influence

experience.description: Built a thriving youth ministry that successfully integrated students into the broader life of the church, fostering long-term faith.
achievements: Developed comprehensive youth program integrating students into church community
Created sustainable discipleship pathways for teenagers and young adults

education.degree: Bachelor of Arts in Pastoral Studies and Counseling

keyMetrics.description: Doubled attendance from 30 to 75 at current position
Annual budget oversight with strategic optimization
